main event: Two witnesses observed a fast-moving, bright red object descending, which appeared to break into two segments as it did so.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 4 seconds,The object was identified as bright red in color,The object seemed to be breaking apart into two segments during descent,This sighting occurred in National City, California, and was reported on 18/06/55,There was no photographic evidence or physical evidence presented.
